thread.title: Emma Watson Has a Princess Moment in Dior
thread.title_full: Emma Watson Has a Princess Moment in Dior

title: Emma Watson Has a Princess Moment in Dior
text: Emma Watson Delivers a Princess Moment in Dior Just in Time for Valentine’s Day February 14, 2017 7:49 PM by Janelle Okwodu Photo: Getty Images Fairy-tale moments are hard to come by, unless you’re Emma Watson, of course. Though her live-action Beauty and the Beast doesn’t hit theaters until March, the British actress has already begun to step out in ensembles worthy of a Disney princess. Arriving at an event in London last night wearing a charming Christian Dior Couture gown covered in tarot illustrations, she channeled the vibe of the bookish heroine, Belle. Embracing a look that could be described as enchanting, Watson provided a preview of what’s to come on the red carpet as she travels the world to promote her latest project. Though Watson and stylist Sarah Slutsky have continuously sought out elegant eveningwear, the upcoming press tour presents the opportunity for a particularly magical wardrobe. With a wealth of couture and decadent dresses at her disposal, Watson can wear just about anything, but if her most recent look is any indication, she plans on staying true to the individualistic spirit of her famous character. In This Story: Emma Watson Recommended For You
